org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.runtime

Class HeaderCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.runtime.HeaderCalculator

  • public class HeaderCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    An implementation used for rasterizing the headers. Populates Column.reportHeaderCell. It is quite messy because it is imperative code with heuristics. Long term we might want to have it a pluggable strategy. It is not needed a.t.m. so enjoy the code!

      • calculatePositionInHeadingLayout

        public void calculatePositionInHeadingLayout(Column c,
                                             int totalRowSpan,
                                             int startingDepth,
                                             int startingColumn)
        recursively rasterizes a column tree by populating Column.reportHeaderCell
        Parameters:
        c - the root of the tree to rasterize
        totalRowSpan - the total rowspan available for the tree
        startingDepth - the depth (y-position, 0-based) at which the root should reside
        startingColumn - the x-position (0-based) at which the root should reside
